news.content:
ðŸ“° ThreeFold Weekly! March 21st Edition (Volume Eleven)


Sharing highlights from last week: A Grid Enhancement Proposal, sharing stories from the community, migration reminders and shipping update, plus some notable forum posts you may have missed.


https://forum.threefold.io/t/threefold-weekly-march-21st-edition-volume-eleven/2515
news.excerpt: Highlights from last week in the ThreeFold ecosystem!

previous.title: Introducing the TFT Development Plan
previous.excerpt: Sharing some of the latest tokenomics updates that will go live with Grid 3.0. A sustainable development plan for TFT.
